shared powerbank rental service

Get a FREE chargefon station today!

Look at the additional BENEFITS to your business

How it works

DOWNLOAD OUR APP

Downloads our app from Google Play or App Store. Register using your cell phone number. Add a payment method.

SCAN QR CODE

Scan QR code located on the Chargefon station to rent a power bank.

TAKE BATTERY

One fully charged portable battery will unlock and slide out of the station for you to take.

EASY RETURN

Once you have finished using a Chargefon power bank, you can return it to any of our Chargefon stations. You can check the status of your order in order history.

Benefits

SPOTS

Located in the busiest parts of Miami.You can find Chargefon Power Banks in many of your favorite spots.

FAST CHARGE

Chargefon Powerbank uses cutting edge FastCharge Technology which allows your phone to fully charge in about an hour.

NO DEPOSIT REQUIRED

Our rental system is based on trust.There is no security deposit required before renting.Enjoy Charging!

EASY RETURN

You donâ€™ t have to return a power bank to the same exact location.You can return a power bank to any Chargefon power bank station in the city.

DEVICE COMPATIBILITY

Every Chargefon Powerbank comes with a lightning cable(iPhone),USB - C cable, and MicroUSB.Our power bank supports most phone devices.

LOW COST

The cost of renting a power bank is affordable and low price.Most phones can be fully charged within an hour.Compared to other charging solutions, Chargefon power banks are one of least expensive.
